Commercial Ice Cube Making Machine (CV10000) See Larger Photo Add to Basket Add to Product Favorites Trade Info
Price: US $ 52000 View More Min. Order ( set) Unit Price 1 US $ 52000 Trade Terms: FOB Payment Terms: L/C, T/T Price Valid Time: From Sep 17, 2011 To Oct 17, 2011
Basic Info.
Model NO.: CV10000 Export Markets: South America, Southeast Asia, Africa, Oceania, Mid East, Eastern Asia
Additional Info.
Trademark: CBFI Packing: Standard Wooden Case Standard: CE, ISO9001, ISO14001 Origin: China HS Code: 8418699020 Production Capacity: 1000kg to 20000kg Company: Guangzhou Ice Source Refrigerant Equipment Co., Limited
Product Description
CV series daily capacity: From 2tons to 20tons Ice cube machine for produce food grade ice, cube ice is edible ice. Cube ice have two sizes for choose, 22mm x 22mm x 22mm, 29mm x 29mm x 22mm.
Cube ice is widely adopt in hotel, bars, banqueting hall, western restaurant, fast food restaurant, CVS( convenience store), cold drinking shop.
1. Reasonable design for the structure, save space, easy to install 2. Greatly save energy, only 80-85kw powers is consumed too produce one ton ice. 3. Ice dropping automatically, no ice dropping auxiliary equipment, lower the error rate. 4. Special ice outlet, ice outgoing automatically, no need taking ice by hand and ensure the ice clean and sanitary.
